Generation IX.Scarlet: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.
Generation IX.Violet: It slowly brings its exceedingly heavy head down upon the ground, splitting the earth open with huge fissures that run over 160 feet deep.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Groundblight Shrine ( Only one )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Groundblight Shrine ( Only one )
